author: Lucas Matney
title: Sony announces $10M fund to help indie game developers impacted by COVID-19
description: Though more people are stuck at home with their PCs and gaming consoles, times are still tough for small indie game developers that are often dependent on gaming conferences to both promote their titles and source investments and publishing deals. Today, Sony…
content:
